com.shopify.buy.model

Class PaymentToken

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.shopify.buy.model.PaymentToken

  • public final class PaymentToken
extends Object
    Class that represents the payment session associated with the checkout to be completed

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static PaymentToken createAndroidPayPaymentToken(String token, String publicKeyHash)
      Creates a PaymentToken for use in completing an Android Pay transaction
      static PaymentToken createCreditCardPaymentToken(String paymentSessionId)
      Creates a PaymentToken for use in completing credit card transaction
      static PaymentToken createEmptyPaymentToken()
      Creates a PaymentToken with an empty body.

    • Method Detail

      • createCreditCardPaymentToken

        public static PaymentToken createCreditCardPaymentToken(String paymentSessionId)
        Creates a PaymentToken for use in completing credit card transaction
        Parameters:
        paymentSessionId - The payment session id
        Returns:
        a PaymentToken

      • createAndroidPayPaymentToken

        public static PaymentToken createAndroidPayPaymentToken(String token,
                                                        String publicKeyHash)
        Creates a PaymentToken for use in completing an Android Pay transaction
        Parameters:
        token - The Android Pay token
        publicKeyHash - The Android Pay public key
        Returns:
        an empty PaymentToken

      • createEmptyPaymentToken

        public static PaymentToken createEmptyPaymentToken()
        Creates a PaymentToken with an empty body. This token is only valid if the Checkout.getPaymentDue() is 0.
        Returns:
        an empty PaymentToken
